Things to do, places to explore and food to eat in Atlanta.

posts.description:
@mediterranea_atl is Atlanta's first gluten-free full service restaurant and bakery! And it has a ton of vegan and vegetarian options, too. üëå
The Nicoise Salad (pictured above) is an absolute must. Satisfying and healthy at the same time! (And how gorgeous is this plate?!) ‚ù§
Where are some of your favorite healthy spots around Atlanta?
#mediterranea #glutenfree #nicoisesalad #tuna #grantpark #atlbucketlist

I have not been able to stop thinking about this dessert since I ate at @foodterminalatl last week! üòç
It's the "Mango Grapefruit" with coconut ice cream, mango pur√©e, grapefruit and sago. The flavors could not have meshed together more perfectly! üç¶üòã
Food Terminal is a new spot on Buford Highway. The menu is expansive and the food is delicious! ‚ù§
Click the link in my bio to see more drool-worthy photos from Food Terminal.
#foodterminal #bufordhighway #welovebuhi #icecream #dessert #atlbucketlist

Unicorns everywhere!!! But I'm not mad about it. üòúüòç
I'm absolutely in love with these adorable unicorn cupcakes from @lenoxcupcakes, a cute little cupcake shop in Chamblee. Available in chocolate or vanilla, these cupcakes are usually only available on Saturdays. So plan accordingly! ü¶Ñü¶Ñü¶Ñ
Happy Saturday! ü§ó
#lenoxcupcakes #cupcakes #unicorns #unicorncupcakes #chamblee #atlantaeats #atlfoodie #abmlifeiscolorful #atlbucketlist

*slideshow post* Don't forget to swipe!
Once a year La Tavola releases a special "Mezzogiorno menu" featuring a culinary tour of southern Italy‚Äôs hilltop villages and seaside towns. üáÆüáπ
Scroll left to see some of the incredible dishes I enjoyed tonight - you don't want to miss these specials! üòçüçù
This special menu is only available through Saturday, April 29, so hurry up and get over to @fifthgroup's La Tavola before it's too late!
#latavola #fifthgroup #italian #pasta #virginiahighlands #weloveatl #whyiloveatl #eeeeeats #chooseatl #discoveratl #foodie #igersatlanta #atlfoodie #atlantaeats #atlanta #atl #eater #buzzfeast #f52grams #feedfeed #instafood #forkyeah #foodporn #eastcoastfoodies #foodblogger #foodphotography #atlbucketlist

Poke is definitely having a moment. And I am so excited to see one of my favorite juice bars is now serving it! üéâ
With locations popping up all of Atlanta, @kalemecrazy has become a beloved local juice and smoothie bar. (I can't get enough of The Glow!) üòçüçãüçéüçç
Their latest menu item is a tuna poke bowl, and it is so fresh and delicious! And it's just as tasty taken to go.
Has anyone else tried Kale Me Crazy's new poke? üç£üê†
#kalemecrazy #ad #poke #juice #healthy #atlbucketlist

What's better than a macaron? A macaron ice cream sandwich!! üç¶
@snowvilleshavery is know for its yummy shaved "snow," but I'm loving on its latest creation - the macaron ice cream sandwich. üòç
I'll take a raspberry macaron and superman ice cream sandwich every day, please! üôå
#snowvilleshavery #macarons #icecreamsandwich #macaronicecreamsandwich #atlbucketlist

Hello unicorn frappuccino!! üòçüéâü¶Ñüåà
@starbucks might not be Atlanta-specific, but this limited edition frapp is just too pretty to keep off my feed! ‚ù§
It tastes like a creamy mango milkshake, so definitely go when you're in the mood for something sweet! I've gotten mixed feedback on it, but we can all agree it is beautiful. And if you wanna try it for yourself hurry- it's only available through April 23!! üò±
#unicornfrappuccino #starbucks #unicorn #atlbucketlist

GIVEAWAY ALERT! üéâ
Summer registration for @gokickballatl is now open! So if you like making friends, having fun and getting a little sweaty, keep reading. Yes, the kickball league is a big part of it, but Go Kickball also hosts events all season long! üôå
I've teamed up with Go Kickball to offer one lucky winner the ultimate kickball package including a free season for two, a free kickball and a pair of tickets to the Atlanta Summer Beerfest on June 17. üçª
To enter:
1. Follow @gokickballatl & @atl_bucketlist.
2. Like this photo.
3. Tag the friend you'd let tag along on all of the fun!
The winner will be announced on Thursday, April 20 at 9 pm. Must be 21+ to enter. Good luck! üèÜ
#ad #gokickballatl #giveaway #atlbucketlist

Good news! Tickets for my iPhone food photography class at @holemanandfinch are now available online! Click the link in my bio to register. üéâüéâ
This special brunch class is this Sunday, April 23 from 1:30-3 pm. üç≥üçπEach ticket includes an appetizer, brunch entree, dessert and of course the class! If you like taking photos of food - or anything else - but don't want to carry around a bulky camera this class is for you. I'll go over some of my favorite tips on angles, lighting and more (and throw in a few tips on social media, too!)
I hope to see you all there! ü§ó
#holemanandfinch #iphonephotography #foodphotography #brunch #atlbucketlist

Mornings are always better with biscuits - especially when they're from @callieshotlittlebiscuitatl! ‚ù§
And just for Easter they've created this festive (and yummy) biscuit topped with vanilla frosting and Easter eggs! üê£üê∞üíê
Happy Easter, everyone!
#callieshotlittlebiscuit #biscuits #virginiahighlands #easter #atlbucketlist
